    One paper is accepted by NeurIPS 2025 as Spotlight

    less than 1 minute read

    Published: September 17, 2025

    Qiangqiang Mao’s work “Differentiable Decision Tree via “ReLU+Argmin” Reformulation” is accepted as Spotlight by Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS).

    paper accpeted

    One paper is accepted by IEEE TSMC: Systems

    less than 1 minute read

    Published: August 10, 2022

    Multiobjective Dynamic Optimization of Nonlinear Systems With Path Constraints is accepted by IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems. Thanks my supervisor Jun Fu and the coauthors!
